item.title: Lyricall Architecture
item.description: Table of Contents Architecture of lyricall.net Table of Contents Technology tl;dr: App Overview Front End Redux React Back End Database - PostgresQL Why Postgres Database Schema Lyricall Tables Straggler Tables ASP.NET / Entity Framework Tables Server - .NET Core 2.0 / ASP.NET Core 2.0 Why .NET Core Intermission - the DotNetStandardSpotifyWebApi library Intermission - the ASP.NET Security Project API Server Architecture Entity Framework vs Hand Crafted SQL Automatic Timed Services Services Models Validation Scanning Hosting Digital Ocean Security Backups CI/CD Microsoft Azure Backups CI/CD Let’s Encrypt Architecture of lyricall.
